prompts: Create a small, purple Pokemon that has long ears and likes to scurry around.
Design an agile rodent Pokemon with a vibrant purple coat and sharp whiskers.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a round body, large teeth, and is always on the lookout for food.
Generate a Normal-type Pokemon with an expressive face and a playful demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, known for its quick reflexes and speed.
Make a cartoonish Pokemon that has a mischievous look and a long, curled tail.
Give me a Pokemon that is cute yet cunning, capable of outsmarting its opponents.
